Aether Raids Seasons:
When deploying both a Mythic
Hero and a Hero with a blessing
matching the Aether Raids season,
the blessed Hero will gain a bonus
in battle. You will also get other
benefits, like higher Maximum
Lift or reduced Defense Lift loss.

Escape Ladder (O):
The number of uses for this
structure will not decrease if an
attack fails when either:
・ The date changes during your
first battle of the day.
・ The date changes and your
Aether is filled to its maximum.

Mythic Aether Raids Defense 1:
In dark and anima seasons,
if a matching Mythic Hero is part
of a defensive team, Defense Lift
loss will decrease according to the
Mythic Hero's number of merges.

Mythic Aether Raids Defense 2:
In dark and anima seasons, if a
Hero with a blessing that matches
the season is deployed as a part
of a defense team along with a
matching Mythic Hero, Defense
Lift loss will be decreased.

・ This value is the maximum Lift you can earn
by making a successful attack.
・ A successful attack yields 80 Lift. You earn
20 more for having a Bonus Ally in your raiding
party. (You will not receive more bonus Lift for
adding more than one Bonus Ally.)
・ In light and astra seasons, if Heroes with
matching blessings are sent out with a matching
Mythic Hero, this value will increase.
・ In light and astra seasons, this will increase
depending on the number of merges the Mythic
Hero has.

・ This is the largest amount of Lift you can lose
given the makeup of your defensive team.
・ The standard amount is 80.
・ In dark and anima seasons, if Heroes with
matching blessings are sent out with a matching
Mythic Hero, this value will decrease.
・ In dark and anima seasons, this will decrease
depending on the number of merges the Mythic
Hero has.

Mythic Aether Raids Offense 1:
In Light and Astra seasons,
if a Mythic Hero is part of a
raiding party, acquired Lift will
increase according to the Mythic
Hero's number of merges.

Mythic Aether Raids Offense 2:
In Light and Astra seasons, if a
Hero with a blessing that matches
the season is deployed as part of
a raiding party along with a
Mythic Hero of the same blessing
type, acquired Lift will increase.

Mythic Aether Raids Defense 1:
In Dark and Anima seasons,
if a Mythic Hero is part of a
defensive team, Defense Lift loss
will decrease according to the
Mythic Hero's number of merges.

Mythic Aether Raids Defense 2:
In Dark and Anima seasons, if a
Hero with a blessing that matches
the season is deployed as part
of a defensive team along with a
Mythic Hero of the same blessing
type, Defense Lift loss will
decrease.

Confer the Light blessing?

The blessed ally will gain a boost
in Aether Raids if they go into
battle with a Light-type Mythic
Hero during Light season.

Confer the Dark blessing?

The blessed ally will gain a boost
in Aether Raids if they go into
battle with a Dark-type Mythic
Hero during Dark season.

Confer the Astra blessing?

The blessed ally will gain a boost
in Aether Raids if they go into
battle with an Astra-type Mythic
Hero during Astra season.

Confer the Anima blessing?

The blessed ally will gain a boost
in Aether Raids if they go into
battle with an Anima-type Mythic
Hero during Anima season.

Conferring Blessings:
Use Blessing items to confer
blessings on your allies.

Blessings cannot be conferred on
Legendary Heroes like Fjorm or
Mythic Heroes like Eir.

Blessing Effects #1:
Blessed allies receive double
the usual amount of SP and EXP
during battles.

Please note that while blessings
cannot be conferred on
Legendary Heroes or Mythic
Heroes, they will always earn
double the usual amount of SP
and EXP in battle.

Blessing Effects #2:
Match a Legendary Hero or
Mythic Hero, the current season's
type, and your allies' blessings to
earn a special bonus.

For example, go into battle with
the Water-type Legendary Hero
Fjorm during Water season with
Water-blessed allies to earn
a bonus of HP+3 and Spd+3.

Season Schedule:
You can check the top of the
Battle screen and other locations
for info on the current season.

Legendary & Mythic Heroes:
Legendary Heroes and Mythic
Heroes have an icon on their
profile screen. Tap the icon to
check what type of Legendary
Effect or Mythic Effect they have.

Aether Raids - Light & Dark Season:
Allies blessed with Light gain a boost
when they go into battle with a
Light-type Mythic Hero.
Allies blessed with Dark gain a boost
when they go into battle with a
Dark-type Mythic Hero.

Aether Raids - Astra & Anima Season:
Allies blessed with Astra gain a boost
when they go into battle with an Astra-type
Mythic Hero.
Allies blessed with Anima gain a boost
when they go into battle with an Anima-type
Mythic Hero.
